text: @DavidBrodyCBN @realDonaldTrump Well sure David. But you are missing the point! MAGATS are SUPPOSED to ignore the coronavirus and risk death because if they don't put themselves at risk, then they are considered weak. So are you saying there are a bunch of weak MAGATS that didn't show up and that is okay?
